title: Server lag
body: It's been 2 weeks and they've been pretty dreadful, the servers have been causing many people spikes for no reason and it's really affecting the fun of the game, tell me what's fun when you can see your health bar going down but no idea what's hitting you while you're doing the moonwalk?

replies.body:
>while you're doing the moonwalk?

Who cares; [you're moonwalking!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uSezq9sf4S8)
